name: Stampede Potato Salad
description: Bring BBQ flavour right into a favourite summertime side-dish!

ingredients.name: medium potatoes
ingredients.additionalInstruction: such as russet or Yukon gold

preparation: Peel and chop potatoes. Place in a 12 Cup Multipurpose Pot. Cover with water; bring to a boil over high heat. Boil 6-8 min, or until just tender. Drain and rinse with cold water to stop cooking. Place in a large bowl; add 1 tbsp vinegar. Stir gently to coat.
While potatoes cook, in a small bowl, whisk seasoning, with remaining vinegar, ketchup, mayo, and brown sugar. Set aside.
Thinly slice celery and dice red onion.
After tossing potatoes with vinegar, stir in sauce, celery, and onion. Add toppings, if desired.
Serve at room temperature or cover and chill until ready to serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup chopped veggies.
